Title: Relates to requests for birth certificates
Summary: Provides that a certified copy of a birth record shall be issued upon a specific request therefor by a person with a direct interest in the content of the birth record and that the information contained therein is necessary for the determination of personal or property right.
LawCode: Amd ยง4173, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requests for birth certificates
